mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pgp.member_info (member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_nickname, member_birth, member_phone, member_intro) VALUES (#{member_id},#{member_pw},#{member_name},#{member_nickname},#{member_birth},#{member_phone},#{member_intro});
mapper.select: select count(board.board_idx) from pgp.board where member_idx=#{member_idx};
select * from pgp.board_photo as a join pgp.board as b on a.board_idx = b.board_idx where b.member_idx=#{member_idx} order by b.board_idx desc limit 3 ;
select c.photo_name from pgp.member_info as a join pgp.like as b on a.member_idx=b.member_idx join pgp.board_photo as c on b.board_idx = c.board_idx where a.member_idx=#{member_idx};
